◆ AggroWithInRangeFriends()

int LuaUnit::AggroWithInRangeFriends ( lua_State *  ,
Unit *  ptr 
)
static

Definition at line 428 of file LuaUnit.cpp.

429{
430 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
431 return 0;
432
433 // If Pointer isn't in combat skip everything
434 if (!ptr->getCombatHandler().isInCombat())
435 return 0;
436
437 Unit* pTarget = ptr->getAIInterface()->getCurrentTarget();
438 if (!pTarget)
439 return 0;
440
441 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangeObjectsSet())
442 {
443 if (!itr)
444 continue;
445
446 Object* obj = itr;
447 // Object Isn't a Unit, Unit is Dead
448 if (!obj->isCreatureOrPlayer() || dynamic_cast<Unit*>(obj)->isDead())
449 continue;
450
451 if (!obj->isFriendlyTo(ptr))
452 continue;
453
454 if (ptr->GetDistance2dSq(obj) > 10 * 10) // 10yrd range?
455 continue;
456
457 const Unit* pUnit = dynamic_cast<Unit*>(obj);
458
459 pUnit->getAIInterface()->setCurrentTarget(pTarget);
460 pUnit->getAIInterface()->onHostileAction(pTarget);
461 }
462 return 0;
463}

Definition at line 4005 of file LuaUnit.cpp.

4006{
4007 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
4008 {
4009 return 0;
4010 }
4011 Unit* target = CHECK_UNIT(L, 1);
4012 if (target && ptr->getThreatManager().canHaveThreatList())
4013 {
4014 auto& threatManager = ptr->getThreatManager();
4015 if (threatManager.getCurrentVictim() == target)
4016 {
4017 // Unit is already attacking this target
4018 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
4019 return 1;
4020 }
4021
4022 if (!threatManager.isThreatListEmpty())
4023 {
4024 threatManager.addThreat(target, 20.0f);
4025 // Set threat equal to highest threat currently on target
4026 threatManager.matchUnitThreatToHighestThreat(target);
4027 }
4028
4029 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
4030 }
4031 else
4032 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
4033 return 1;

◆ CreateGuardian()

int LuaUnit::CreateGuardian ( lua_State *  L,
Unit *  ptr 
)
static

Definition at line 2915 of file LuaUnit.cpp.

2916{
2917 const uint32_t entry = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
2918 //uint32_t duration = CHECK_ULONG(L, 2);
2919 const float angle = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 3);
2920 const uint32_t lvl = CHECK_ULONG(L, 4);
2921
2922 if ((ptr == nullptr) || (entry == 0) || (lvl == 0))
2923 return 0;
2924
2925 CreatureProperties const* cp = sMySQLStore.getCreatureProperties(entry);
2926 if (cp == nullptr)
2927 return 0;
2928
2929 LocationVector v(ptr->GetPosition());
2930 v.x += (3 * (cosf(angle + v.o)));
2931 v.y += (3 * (sinf(angle + v.o)));
2932
2933 Summon* guardian = ptr->getWorldMap()->summonCreature(entry, v);
2934 if (guardian == nullptr)
2935 return 0;
2936
2937 guardian->load(cp, ptr, v, 0, 0);
2938 guardian->PushToWorld(ptr->getWorldMap());
2939
2940 PUSH_UNIT(L, guardian);
2941
2942 return 1;
2943}

#define PUSH_UNIT(L, unit)

◆ CreateLuaEvent()

int LuaUnit::CreateLuaEvent ( lua_State *  L,
Unit *  ptr 
)
static

Definition at line 699 of file LuaUnit.cpp.

700{
701 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
702 {
703 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
704 return 1;
705 }
706
707 const char* typeName = luaL_typename(L, 1);
708 const int delay = static_cast<int>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
709 const int repeats = static_cast<int>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 3));
710 if (!delay)
711 return 0;
712
713 lua_settop(L, 1);
714 int functionRef = 0;
715 if (!strcmp(typeName, "function"))
716 functionRef = luaL_ref(L, LUA_REGISTRYINDEX);
717 else if (!strcmp(typeName, "string"))
718 functionRef = LuaHelpers::ExtractfRefFromCString(L, luaL_checkstring(L, 1));
719
720 if (functionRef)
721 {
722 auto ev = TimedEvent::Allocate(ptr, std::make_unique<CallbackP1<LuaEngine, int>>(LuaGlobal::instance()->luaEngine().get(), &LuaEngine::CallFunctionByReference, functionRef), EVENT_LUA_CREATURE_EVENTS, delay, repeats);
723 ptr->event_AddEvent(std::move(ev));
724 std::map< uint64_t, std::set<int> >& objRefs = LuaGlobal::instance()->luaEngine()->getObjectFunctionRefs();
725 const std::map< uint64_t, std::set<int> >::iterator itr = objRefs.find(ptr->getGuid());
726 if (itr == objRefs.end())
727 {
728 std::set<int> refs;
729 refs.insert(functionRef);
730 objRefs.insert(make_pair(ptr->getGuid(), refs));
731 }
732 else
733 {
734 std::set<int>& refs = itr->second;
735 refs.insert(functionRef);
736 }
737 }
738 return 0;
739}
EVENT_LUA_CREATURE_EVENTS
@ EVENT_LUA_CREATURE_EVENTS
Definition LUAEngine.hpp:169
CallbackP1
Definition CallBack.h:126

◆ DismissVehicle()

int LuaUnit::DismissVehicle ( lua_State *  ,

)

Definition at line 6508 of file LuaUnit.cpp.

6509{
6510#ifdef FT_VEHICLES
6511 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6512 {
6513 return 0;
6514 }
6515
6516 Vehicle* v = nullptr;
6517 if (ptr->getVehicleKit() != nullptr)
6518 {
6519 v = ptr->getVehicleKit();
6520 }
6521 else
6522 {
6523 if (ptr->isPlayer() && (ptr->getVehicle() != nullptr))
6524 v = ptr->getVehicle();
6525 }
6526
6527 if (v == nullptr)
6528 return 0;
6529
6530 v->removeAllPassengers();
6531
6532 Unit* o = v->getBase();
6533

6536 else

6538#endif

6041 }
6042
6043 float closest_dist = 99999.99f;
6044 float current_dist = 0;
6045 Unit* ret = nullptr;
6046 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangeObjectsSet())
6047 {
6048 if (!itr || !itr->isCreatureOrPlayer() || !ptr->isHostileTo(itr))
6049 continue;
6050
6051 current_dist = ptr->GetDistance2dSq(itr);
6052 if (current_dist < closest_dist)
6053 {
6054 closest_dist = current_dist;
6055 ret = dynamic_cast<Unit*>(itr);
6056 }
6057 }
6058 PUSH_UNIT(L, ret);
6059 return 1;
6060}
Here is the call graph for this function:

912{

914 return 0;

928 }

◆ GetGroupPlayers()

int LuaUnit::GetGroupPlayers ( lua_State *  L,
Unit *  ptr 
)
static

Definition at line 3039 of file LuaUnit.cpp.

3040{
3041 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
3042 return 0;
3043
3044 Player* _player = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
3045
3046 uint32_t count = 0;
3047 lua_newtable(L);
3048 if (const auto group = _player->getGroup())
3049 {
3050 group->getLock().lock();
3051 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < group->GetSubGroupCount(); i++)
3052 {
3053 const SubGroup* sgrp = group->GetSubGroup(i);
3054 for (const auto itr : sgrp->getGroupMembers())
3055 {
3056 if (Player* loggedInPlayer = sObjectMgr.getPlayer(itr->guid))
3057 {
3058 if (loggedInPlayer->getZoneId() == _player->getZoneId() && _player->GetInstanceID() == loggedInPlayer->GetInstanceID())
3059 {
3060 count++;
3061 lua_pushinteger(L, count);
3062 PUSH_UNIT(L, loggedInPlayer);
3063 lua_rawset(L, -3);
3064 }
3065 }
3066 }
3067 }
3068 group->getLock().unlock();
3069 }
3070 return 1;
3071}

5879 if (pGuild != nullptr)
5880 {
5881 for (const auto& member : pGuild->getMemberNameList())
5882 {
5883 count++;
5884 lua_pushinteger(L, count);
5885 //Paroxysm : Why do we push player names are opposed to objects?
5886 //hyper: because guild members might not be logged in
5887 //ret = (*itr).first->m_loggedInPlayer;
5888 //PUSH_UNIT(L, ((Unit*)ret), false);
5889 lua_pushstring(L, member.c_str());
5890 lua_rawset(L, -3);
5891 }
5892 }
5893 else
5894 lua_pushnil(L);
5895
5896 return 1;
5897}
Here is the call graph for this function:

Definition at line 1190 of file LuaUnit.cpp.

1191{
1192 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
1193 return 0;
1194
1195 const uint32_t entry = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
1196 const Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
1197 const int16_t slot = plr->getItemInterface()->GetInventorySlotById(entry);
1198 if (slot == -1) //check bags
1199 {
1200 for (uint8_t contslot = INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_START; contslot != INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END; contslot++)
1201 {
1202 Container* bag = dynamic_cast<Container*>(plr->getItemInterface()->GetInventoryItem(contslot));
1203 if (bag == nullptr)
1204 continue;
1205
1206 for (uint8_t bslot = 0; bslot != bag->getSlotCount(); bslot++)
1207 {
1208 if (bag->getItem(bslot) && bag->getItem(bslot)->getEntry() == entry)
1209 {
1210 PUSH_ITEM(L, bag->getItem(bslot));
1211 return 1;
1212 }
1213 }
1214 }
1215 }
1216 PUSH_ITEM(L, plr->getItemInterface()->GetInventoryItem(slot));
1217 return 1;

252{
253 if (!ptr)
254 return 0;
255

257 {

◆ GetPlayerClass()

int LuaUnit::GetPlayerClass ( lua_State *  L,
Unit *  ptr 
)
static

Definition at line 1736 of file LuaUnit.cpp.

1737{
1738 if (!ptr || !ptr->isPlayer())
1739 {
1740 lua_pushstring(L, "Unknown");
1741 return 1;
1742 }
1743 const int plrclass = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->getClass();
1744
1745 switch (plrclass)
1746 {
1747 case 1:
1748 lua_pushstring(L, "Warrior");
1749 break;
1750 case 2:
1751 lua_pushstring(L, "Paladin");
1752 break;
1753 case 3:
1754 lua_pushstring(L, "Hunter");
1755 break;
1756 case 4:
1757 lua_pushstring(L, "Rogue");
1758 break;
1759 case 5:
1760 lua_pushstring(L, "Priest");
1761 break;
1762 case 6:
1763 lua_pushstring(L, "Death Knight");
1764 break;
1765 case 7:
1766 lua_pushstring(L, "Shaman");
1767 break;
1768 case 8:
1769 lua_pushstring(L, "Mage");
1770 break;
1771 case 9:
1772 lua_pushstring(L, "Warlock");
1773 break;
1774 //case 10:
1775 case 11:
1776 lua_pushstring(L, "Druid");
1777 break;
1778 default:
1779 lua_pushstring(L, "Unknown");
1780 break;
1781 }
1782
1783 return 1;
1784}
Here is the call graph for this function:

◆ GetRandomPlayer()

int LuaUnit::GetRandomPlayer ( lua_State *  L,
Unit *  ptr 
)
static

Definition at line 938 of file LuaUnit.cpp.

939{
940 if (ptr == nullptr)
941 return 0;
942
943 const int flag = static_cast<int>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
944 Player* ret = nullptr;
945 std::vector<Player*> players;
946 switch (flag)
947 {
948 case RANDOM_ANY:
949 {
950 uint32_t count = static_cast<uint32_t>(ptr->getInRangePlayersCount());
951 const uint32_t r = Util::getRandomUInt(count - 1);
952 count = 0;
953 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangePlayersSet())
954 {
955 if (count == r)
956 {
957 ret = dynamic_cast<Player*>(itr);
958 break;
959 }
960 ++count;
961 }
962 }
963 break;
964 case RANDOM_IN_SHORTRANGE:
965 {
966 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangePlayersSet())
967 {
968 Player* obj = dynamic_cast<Player*>(itr);
969 if (obj && obj->CalcDistance(obj, ptr) <= 8)
970 players.push_back(obj);
971 }
972 if (players.size())
973 ret = players[Util::getRandomUInt(static_cast<uint32_t>(players.size() - 1))];
974 }
975 break;
976 case RANDOM_IN_MIDRANGE:
977 {
978 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangePlayersSet())
979 {
980 Player* obj = dynamic_cast<Player*>(itr);
981 const float distance = obj->CalcDistance(obj, ptr);
982 if (distance < 20 && distance > 8)
983 players.push_back(obj);
984 }
985 if (players.size())
986 ret = players[Util::getRandomUInt(static_cast<uint32_t>(players.size() - 1))];
987 }
988 break;
989 case RANDOM_IN_LONGRANGE:
990 {
991 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangePlayersSet())
992 {
993 Player* obj = dynamic_cast<Player*>(itr);
994 if (obj && obj->CalcDistance(obj, ptr) >= 20)
995 players.push_back(obj);
996 }
997 if (players.size())
998 ret = players[Util::getRandomUInt(static_cast<uint32_t>(players.size() - 1))];
999 }
1000 break;
1001 case RANDOM_WITH_MANA:
1002 {
1003 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangePlayersSet())
1004 {
1005 Player* obj = dynamic_cast<Player*>(itr);
1006 if (obj && obj->getPowerType() == POWER_TYPE_MANA)
1007 players.push_back(obj);
1008 }
1009 if (players.size())
1010 ret = players[Util::getRandomUInt(static_cast<uint32_t>(players.size() - 1))];
1011 }
1012 break;
1013 case RANDOM_WITH_ENERGY:
1014 {
1015 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangePlayersSet())
1016 {
1017 Player* obj = dynamic_cast<Player*>(itr);
1018 if (obj && obj->getPowerType() == POWER_TYPE_ENERGY)
1019 players.push_back(obj);
1020 }
1021 if (players.size())
1022 ret = players[Util::getRandomUInt(static_cast<uint32_t>(players.size() - 1))];
1023 }
1024 break;
1025 case RANDOM_WITH_RAGE:
1026 {
1027 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangePlayersSet())
1028 {
1029 Player* obj = dynamic_cast<Player*>(itr);
1030 if (obj && obj->getPowerType() == POWER_TYPE_RAGE)
1031 players.push_back(obj);
1032 }
1033 if (players.size())
1034 ret = players[Util::getRandomUInt(static_cast<uint32_t>(players.size() - 1))];
1035 }
1036 break;
1037 case RANDOM_NOT_MAINTANK:
1038 {
1039 const Unit* mt = ptr->getAIInterface()->getCurrentTarget();
1040 if (mt == nullptr || !mt->isPlayer())
1041 return 0;
1042
1043 for (const auto& itr : ptr->getInRangePlayersSet())
1044 {
1045 Player* obj = dynamic_cast<Player*>(itr);
1046 if (obj != mt)
1047 players.push_back(obj);
1048 }
1049 if (players.size())
1050 ret = players[Util::getRandomUInt(static_cast<uint32_t>(players.size() - 1))];
1051 }
1052 break;
1053 }
1054
1055 if (ret == nullptr)
1056 lua_pushnil(L);
1057 else
1058 PUSH_UNIT(L, ret);
1059
1060 return 1;
1061}
RANDOM_WITH_RAGE
@ RANDOM_WITH_RAGE
Definition LUAEngine.hpp:139
RANDOM_IN_LONGRANGE
@ RANDOM_IN_LONGRANGE
Definition LUAEngine.hpp:137
RANDOM_NOT_MAINTANK
@ RANDOM_NOT_MAINTANK
Definition LUAEngine.hpp:141

@ RANDOM_IN_SHORTRANGE

5549 }
5550
5551 const char* channelName = luaL_checkstring(L, 1);
5552 auto* const channel = sChannelMgr.getChannel(channelName, dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr));
5553 if (!channel)
5554 return 0;
5555
5556 const char* password = luaL_optstring(L, 2, channel->getChannelPassword().c_str());
5557
5558 if (channel->hasMember(dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)))
5559 return 0;
5560
5561 channel->attemptJoin(dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr), password);
5562
5563 return 1;
5564}

◆ LearnSpells()

int LuaUnit::LearnSpells ( lua_State *  L,
Unit *  ptr 
)
static

Definition at line 1558 of file LuaUnit.cpp.

1559{
1560 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
1561 {
1562 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
1563 return 1;
1564 }
1565
1566 if (!strcmp("table", luaL_typename(L, 1)))
1567 {
1568 const int table = lua_gettop(L);
1569 lua_pushnil(L);
1570 while (lua_next(L, table) != 0)
1571 {
1572 if (lua_isnumber(L, -1))
1573 dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr)->addSpell(CHECK_ULONG(L, -1));
1574 lua_pop(L, 1);
1575 }
1576 lua_pushboolean(L, 1);
1577 lua_replace(L, table);
1578 lua_settop(L, table); // Paroxysm: The stack should be balanced but just in case.
1579 }
1580 else
1581 {
1582 lua_settop(L, 0);
1583 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
1584 }
1585 return 1;
1586}

int LuaUnit::LifeTimeKills ( lua_State *  L,

)
static

Definition at line 4170 of file LuaUnit.cpp.

4171{
4172 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
4173 {
4174 return 0;
4175 }
4176
4177 const int kills = static_cast<int>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
4178 const char* check = luaL_checklstring(L, 2, nullptr);
4179 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
4180 const int killscheck = plr->getLifetimeHonorableKills();
4181 if (check && strncmp(check, "add", 4) == 0 && kills > 0)
4182 {
4183 plr->setLifetimeHonorableKills(killscheck + kills);
4184 plr->saveToDB(false);
4185 return 0;
4186 }
4187 if (check && strncmp(check, "del", 4) == 0 && killscheck >= kills)
4188 {
4189 plr->setLifetimeHonorableKills(killscheck - kills);
4190 plr->saveToDB(false);
4191 return 0;
4192 }
4193 if (check && strncmp(check, "set", 4) == 0 && kills >= 0)
4194 {
4195 plr->setLifetimeHonorableKills(kills);
4196 plr->saveToDB(false);
4197 return 0;
4198 }
4199 if (check == nullptr || kills == 0)
4200 {
4201 lua_pushinteger(L, killscheck);
4202 return 1;
4203 }
4204 return 0;
4205}

4832 const float z = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 3);
4833 const float o = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 4);
4834 const uint32_t mov_flag = CHECK_ULONG(L, 5); //0 - walk, 256 - teleport, 4096 - run, 12288 - fly
4835 float moveSpeed = (float)luaL_optnumber(L, 6, 1.0f);
4836 if (moveSpeed == 1.0f)
4837 {
4838 if (mov_flag == 0)
4839 moveSpeed = 2.5f * 0.001f;
4840 else
4841 moveSpeed = 7.0f * 0.001f;
4842 }
4843 ptr->setFacing(o);
4844 ptr->SetOrientation(o);
4845 const float distance = ptr->CalcDistance(ptr->GetPositionX(), ptr->GetPositionY(), ptr->GetPositionZ(), x, y, z);
4846 const uint32_t moveTime = uint32_t(distance / moveSpeed);
4847 WorldPacket data(SMSG_MONSTER_MOVE, 50);
4848 data << ptr->GetNewGUID();
4849 data << uint8_t(0);
4850 data << ptr->GetPositionX();
4851 data << ptr->GetPositionY();
4852 data << ptr->GetPositionZ();
4853 data << Util::getMSTime();

4855 data << uint32_t(mov_flag);
4856 data << moveTime;
4857 data << uint32_t(1);
4858 data << x << y << z;
4859
4860 ptr->sendMessageToSet(&data, true);
4861 ptr->SetPosition(x, y, z, o);
4862 return 0;

◆ PhaseAdd()

int LuaUnit::PhaseAdd ( lua_State *  L,
Unit *  ptr 
)
static

Definition at line 310 of file LuaUnit.cpp.

311{
312 const uint32_t newphase = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
313 const bool Save = (luaL_optinteger(L, 2, false) > 0 ? true : false);
314 Creature* crt = nullptr;
315 Player* p_target = nullptr;
316 //Save is only for creatures. if you want to save to DB with players, use your own query (security purposes).
317 //Lua: CharDBQuery("UPDATE `characters` SET `phase`='"..player:GetPhase().."' WHERE (`name`='"..player:GetName().."'",0)
318 if (!ptr)
319 return 0;
320
321 switch (ptr->getObjectTypeId())
322 {
323 case TYPEID_UNIT:
324 crt = dynamic_cast<Creature*>(ptr);
325 crt->setPhase(PHASE_ADD, newphase);
326 if (crt->m_spawn)
327 crt->m_spawn->phase |= newphase;
328
329 if (Save)
330 {
331 crt->SaveToDB();
332 crt->m_loadedFromDB = true;
333 }
334 break;
335
336 case TYPEID_PLAYER:
337 p_target = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
338 p_target->setPhase(PHASE_ADD, newphase);
339 break;
340
341 default:
342 break;
343 }
344 return 0;
345}

2064

2082 }

2093 qstrelid = (uint8_t)unit->GetQuestRelation(quest_id);
2094 unit->DeleteQuest(qstrel);
2095 }
2096 unit->_LoadQuests();
2097 return 0;

Definition at line 659 of file LuaUnit.cpp.

660{
661 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreature())
662 return 0;
663
664 const char* typeName = luaL_typename(L, 1);
665 const int delay = static_cast<int>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
666 const int repeats = static_cast<int>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 3));
667 if (!delay)
668 return 0;
669 lua_settop(L, 1);
670 int functionRef = 0;
671 if (!strcmp(typeName, "function"))
672 functionRef = luaL_ref(L, LUA_REGISTRYINDEX);
673 else if (!strcmp(typeName, "string"))
674 functionRef = LuaHelpers::ExtractfRefFromCString(L, luaL_checkstring(L, 1));
675
676 if (functionRef)
677 {
678 Creature* creature = dynamic_cast<Creature*>(ptr);
679 sEventMgr.AddEvent(creature, &Creature::TriggerScriptEvent, functionRef, EVENT_LUA_CREATURE_EVENTS, delay, repeats, EVENT_FLAG_DO_NOT_EXECUTE_IN_WORLD_CONTEXT);
680 std::map< uint64_t, std::set<int> >& objRefs = LuaGlobal::instance()->luaEngine()->getObjectFunctionRefs();
681 const std::map< uint64_t, std::set<int> >::iterator itr = objRefs.find(ptr->getGuid());
682 if (itr == objRefs.end())
683 {
684 std::set<int> refs;
685 refs.insert(functionRef);
686 objRefs.insert(make_pair(ptr->getGuid(), refs));
687 }
688 else
689 {
690 std::set<int>& refs = itr->second;
691 refs.insert(functionRef);
692 }
693 }
694 return 0;
695}

3443{

3445 {
3446 return 0;
3447 }
3448 Creature* unit = dynamic_cast<Creature*>(ptr);
3449 if (unit->IsInWorld())
3450 {
3451 if (unit->m_spawn)
3452 {
3453 const uint32_t cellx = uint32_t(((Map::Terrain::_maxX - unit->m_spawn->x) / Map::Cell::cellSize));
3454 const uint32_t celly = uint32_t(((Map::Terrain::_maxY - unit->m_spawn->y) / Map::Cell::cellSize));
3455
3456 if (cellx <= Map::Cell::_sizeX && celly <= Map::Cell::_sizeY)
3457 {
3458 CellSpawns* sp = unit->getWorldMap()->getBaseMap()->getSpawnsList(cellx, celly);
3459 if (sp != nullptr)
3460 {
3461 for (CreatureSpawnList::iterator itr = sp->CreatureSpawns.begin(); itr != sp->CreatureSpawns.end(); ++itr)
3462 if ((*itr) == unit->m_spawn)
3463 {
3464 sp->CreatureSpawns.erase(itr);
3465 break;
3466 }
3467 }
3468 delete unit->m_spawn;
3469 unit->m_spawn = nullptr;
3470 }
3471 }
3472 unit->RemoveFromWorld(false, true);
3473 }
3474 return 0;
3475}

◆ RepairAllPlayerItems()

int LuaUnit::RepairAllPlayerItems ( lua_State *  L,
Unit *  ptr 
)
static

Definition at line 4095 of file LuaUnit.cpp.

4096{
4097 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
4098 {
4099 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
4100 return 1;
4101 }
4102 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
4103 Item* pItem = nullptr;
4104 Container* pContainer = nullptr;
4105 uint16_t j;
4106 uint16_t i;
4107
4108 for (i = 0; i < MAX_INVENTORY_SLOT; i++)
4109 {
4110 pItem = plr->getItemInterface()->GetInventoryItem(i);
4111 if (pItem != nullptr)
4112 {
4113 if (pItem->isContainer())
4114 {
4115 pContainer = dynamic_cast<Container*>(pItem);
4116 for (j = 0; j < pContainer->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots; ++j)
4117 {
4118 pItem = pContainer->getItem(j);
4119 if (pItem != nullptr)
4120 {
4121 pItem->setDurabilityToMax();
4122 }
4123 }
4124 }
4125 else
4126 {
4127 if (pItem->getItemProperties()->MaxDurability > 0 && i < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END && pItem->getDurability() <= 0)
4128 {
4129 pItem->setDurabilityToMax();
4130 plr->applyItemMods(pItem, i, true);
4131 }
4132 else
4133 {
4134 pItem->setDurabilityToMax();
4135 }
4136 }
4137 }
4138 }
4139 return 0;
4140}

static

Definition at line 4535 of file LuaUnit.cpp.

4536{
4537 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
4538 {
4539 return 0;
4540 }
4541
4542 const uint64_t guid = CHECK_GUID(L, 1);
4543 const uint8_t loot_type = (uint8_t)luaL_checkinteger(L, 2);
4544 uint8_t loot_type2 = 1;
4545 Player* plr = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
4546 plr->setLootGuid(guid);
4547
4548 WoWGuid wowGuid;
4549 wowGuid.Init(guid);
4550
4551 if (wowGuid.isUnit())
4552 {
4553 Unit* pUnit = plr->getWorldMap()->getUnit(guid);
4554 CreatureProperties const* creature_properties = dynamic_cast<Creature*>(pUnit)->GetCreatureProperties();
4555 const auto lootType = pUnit->getWorldMap() ? (pUnit->getWorldMap()->getDifficulty() ? true : false) : false;
4556 switch (loot_type)
4557 {
4558 default:
4559 sLootMgr.fillCreatureLoot(plr, &pUnit->loot, pUnit->getEntry(), lootType);
4560 pUnit->loot.gold = creature_properties ? creature_properties->money : 0;
4561 loot_type2 = 1;
4562 break;
4563 case 2:
4564 sLootMgr.fillSkinningLoot(plr, &pUnit->loot, pUnit->getEntry(), lootType);
4565 loot_type2 = 2;
4566 break;
4567 case 3:
4568 sLootMgr.fillPickpocketingLoot(plr, &pUnit->loot, pUnit->getEntry(), lootType);
4569 loot_type2 = 2;
4570 break;
4571 }
4572 }
4573 else if (wowGuid.isGameObject())
4574 {
4575 GameObject* pGO = plr->getWorldMap()->getGameObject(wowGuid.getGuidLowPart());
4576 if (pGO != nullptr && pGO->IsLootable())
4577 {
4578 GameObject_Lootable* lt = dynamic_cast<GameObject_Lootable*>(pGO);
4579 const auto lootType = pGO->getWorldMap() ? (pGO->getWorldMap()->getDifficulty() ? true : false) : false;
4580 switch (loot_type)
4581 {
4582 default:
4583 sLootMgr.fillGOLoot(plr, &lt->loot, pGO->getEntry(), lootType);
4584 loot_type2 = 1;
4585 break;
4586 case 5:
4587 sLootMgr.fillSkinningLoot(plr, &lt->loot, pGO->getEntry(), lootType);
4588 loot_type2 = 2;
4589 break;
4590 }
4591 }
4592 }
4593 else if (wowGuid.isItem())
4594 {
4595 const Item* pItem = plr->getItemInterface()->GetItemByGUID(guid);
4596 switch (loot_type)
4597 {
4598 case 6:
4599 sLootMgr.fillItemLoot(plr, pItem->m_loot.get(), pItem->getEntry(), plr->getWorldMap() ? (plr->getWorldMap()->getDifficulty() ? true : false) : false);
4600 loot_type2 = 1;
4601 break;
4602 default:
4603 break;
4604 }
4605 }
4606 plr->sendLoot(guid, 2, plr->GetMapId());
4607 return 0;
4608}

3189 }
3190 }

6461{
6462#ifdef FT_VEHICLES
6463 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6464 {
6465 return 0;
6466 }
6467
6468 uint32_t creature_entry = 0;
6469 uint32_t delay = 0;
6470
6471 if (lua_gettop(L) != 2)
6472 return 0;
6473
6474 creature_entry = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
6475 delay = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 2));
6476
6477 if (delay < 1 * 1000)
6478 delay = 1 * 1000;
6479
6480 if (creature_entry == 0)
6481 return 0;
6482
6483 if ((ptr->getVehicleKit() != nullptr) && (!ptr->isPlayer() || !ptr->isVehicle()))
6484 return 0;
6485
6486 CreatureProperties const* cp = sMySQLStore.getCreatureProperties(creature_entry);
6487 if (cp == nullptr)
6488 return 0;
6489
6490 const Player* p = nullptr;
6491 if (ptr->isPlayer())
6492 p = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
6493
6494 if ((cp->vehicleid == 0) && (p == nullptr) && (!p->getSession()->HasGMPermissions()))
6495 return 0;
6496

6498
6499 Creature* c = ptr->getWorldMap()->createCreature(cp->Id);
6500 c->Load(cp, v.x, v.y, v.z, v.o);
6501 c->removeNpcFlags(UNIT_NPC_FLAG_SPELLCLICK);
6502 c->PushToWorld(ptr->getWorldMap());
6503 c->callEnterVehicle(ptr);
6504#endif
6505 return 0;
6506}

int LuaUnit::SpawnCreature ( lua_State *  L,

Definition at line 569 of file LuaUnit.cpp.

570{
571 if (ptr == nullptr)
572 return 0;
573
574 const uint32_t entry = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
575 const float x = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 2);
576 const float y = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 3);
577 const float z = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 4);
578 const float o = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 5);
579 const uint32_t faction = CHECK_ULONG(L, 6);
580 const uint32_t duration = CHECK_ULONG(L, 7);
581 const uint32_t equip1 = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_optinteger(L, 8, 1));
582 const uint32_t equip2 = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_optinteger(L, 9, 1));
583 const uint32_t equip3 = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_optinteger(L, 10, 1));
584 const uint32_t phase = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_optinteger(L, 11, ptr->m_phase));
585 const bool save = (luaL_optinteger(L, 12, 0) ? true : false);
586
587 if (!entry)
588 {
589 lua_pushnil(L);
590 return 1;
591 }
592 CreatureProperties const* p = sMySQLStore.getCreatureProperties(entry);
593 if (p == nullptr)
594 {
595 lua_pushnil(L);
596 return 1;
597 }
598 Creature* pCreature = ptr->getWorldMap()->createCreature(entry);
599 if (pCreature == nullptr)
600 {
601 lua_pushnil(L);
602 return 1;
603 }
604 pCreature->Load(p, x, y, z, o);
605 pCreature->setFaction(faction);
606 pCreature->setVirtualItemSlotId(MELEE, equip1);
607 pCreature->setVirtualItemSlotId(OFFHAND, equip2);
608 pCreature->setVirtualItemSlotId(RANGED, equip3);
609 pCreature->setPhase(PHASE_SET, phase);
610 pCreature->m_noRespawn = true;
611 pCreature->AddToWorld(ptr->getWorldMap());
612 if (duration)
613 pCreature->Despawn(duration, 0);
614 if (save)
615 pCreature->SaveToDB();
616 PUSH_UNIT(L, pCreature);
617 return 1;
618}

◆ SpawnGameObject()

int LuaUnit::SpawnGameObject ( lua_State *  L,

)
static

Definition at line 620 of file LuaUnit.cpp.

621{
622 if (ptr == nullptr)
623 return 0;
624 const uint32_t entry_id = CHECK_ULONG(L, 1);
625 const float x = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 2);
626 const float y = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 3);
627 const float z = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 4);
628 const float o = CHECK_FLOAT(L, 5);
629 const uint32_t duration = CHECK_ULONG(L, 6);
630 const float scale = (float)(luaL_optinteger(L, 7, 100) / 100.0f);
631 const uint32_t phase = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_optinteger(L, 8, ptr->m_phase));
632 const bool save = luaL_optinteger(L, 9, 0) ? true : false;
633 if (entry_id)
634 {
635 GameObjectProperties const* info = sMySQLStore.getGameObjectProperties(entry_id);
636 if (info == nullptr)
637 {
638 DLLLogDetail("Lua script tried to spawn a gameobject that doesn't exist ( %u ). Aborting.", entry_id);
639 lua_pushnil(L);
640 return 1;
641 }
642
643 GameObject* go = ptr->getWorldMap()->createGameObject(entry_id);
644 go->create(entry_id, ptr->getWorldMap(), ptr->GetPhase(), LocationVector(x, y, z, o), QuaternionData(), GO_STATE_CLOSED);
645 go->Phase(PHASE_SET, phase);
646 go->setScale(scale);
647 go->AddToWorld(ptr->getWorldMap());
648
649 if (duration)
650 go->despawn(duration, 0);
651 if (save)
652 go->saveToDB();
653 PUSH_GO(L, go);
654 }
655 else
656 lua_pushnil(L);
657 return 1;
658}

◆ StartQuest()

int LuaUnit::StartQuest ( lua_State *  L,
Unit *  ptr 
)
static

Definition at line 1473 of file LuaUnit.cpp.

1474{
1475 if (ptr == nullptr || !ptr->IsInWorld() || !ptr->isPlayer())
1476 {
1477 lua_pushboolean(L, 0);
1478 return 1;
1479 }
1480 const uint32_t quest_id = static_cast<uint32_t>(luaL_checkinteger(L, 1));
1481 Player* player = dynamic_cast<Player*>(ptr);
1482
1483 if (auto* questProperties = sMySQLStore.getQuestProperties(quest_id))
1484 {
1485 if (player->hasQuestFinished(quest_id))
1486 {
1487 lua_pushnumber(L, 0);
1488 return 1;
1489 }
1490
1491 if (player->hasQuestInQuestLog(quest_id))
1492 {
1493 lua_pushnumber(L, 1);
1494 return 1;
1495 }
1496
1497 const uint8_t open_slot = player->getFreeQuestSlot();
1498 if (open_slot > MAX_QUEST_SLOT)
1499 {
1500 sQuestMgr.SendQuestLogFull(player);
1501 lua_pushnumber(L, 2);
1502 return 1;
1503 }
1504
1505 QuestLogEntry* questLogEntry = new QuestLogEntry(questProperties, player, open_slot);
1506 questLogEntry->updatePlayerFields();
1507 // If the quest should give any items on begin, give them the items.
1508 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < 4; ++i)
1509 {
1510 if (questProperties->receive_items[i])
1511 {
1512 auto item = sObjectMgr.createItem(questProperties->receive_items[i], player);
1513 if (item == nullptr)
1514 return false;
1515
1516 player->getItemInterface()->AddItemToFreeSlot(std::move(item));
1517 }
1518 }
1519
1520 if (questProperties->srcitem && questProperties->srcitem != questProperties->receive_items[0])
1521 {
1522 auto item = sObjectMgr.createItem(questProperties->srcitem, player);
1523 if (item)
1524 {
1525 item->setStackCount(questProperties->srcitemcount ? questProperties->srcitemcount : 1);
1526 player->getItemInterface()->AddItemToFreeSlot(std::move(item));
1527 }
1528 }
1529
1530 sHookInterface.OnQuestAccept(player, questProperties, nullptr);
1531 lua_pushnumber(L, 3);
